texts.es: Rosario es una señora laboriosa de 51 años de edad, madre soltera de una hija, ella emprendió su negocio hace dieciséis años y ha  salido adelante gracias a sus esfuerzos y empeño al ofrecer una riquísima comida a sus clientes, una de sus hijas le ayuda a preparar los alimentos, doña rosario solicita por onceavo ciclo el financiamiento de los socios de kiva, para invertir en la compra de carne, plátanos, repollo, tomate y queso, uno de sus principales logros con el crédito anterior fue emprender un nuevo negocio el cual es la venta de piñata, también compro perlines para mejorar el techo de su vivienda y poco a poco ha logrado ir  mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Rosario is a 51 year old laborious woman. She is the single mother of one daughter. She undertook her business 16 years ago and has gotten ahead thanks to her efforts and determination to offer her customers delicious food. Her daughter helps her to make the food.

Rosario is asking for loan in her 11th cycle from the members of Kiva, to invest into buying meat, plantains, cabbage, tomato and cheese. One of the main achievements with her previous loan was launching a new business which is selling piñatas. She also bought wooden roof beams to improve her home's roof and little-by-little she has managed to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy meat, plantains, cabbage, tomato and cheese.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to rebuild the damaged walls , install pipelines, and to buy glass and planks for renovating his home.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with two children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, etc.

She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like pre-paid mobile load.

Jennifer dreams that one day she will be able to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods and personal care products.

loans.name: Desiree

texts.en:
Desiree works hard to support her family. Desiree is widowed and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like sugar, spices, meat, vegetables, etc.

Desiree has been in this business for 15 years now.

In the future, Desiree would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like sugar, spices, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Marite

texts.en:
Marite is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Marite is 44 years old and has one child still in school.

Marite has a food vending business in the Philippines. Marite requested a PHP 11,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like flour, sugar, cooking oil and other materials for her food production business.

Marite has been in this business for 5 years. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, sugar, cooking oil and other materials for her food production business.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Daisy works hard to support her family.

She has a internet café business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Daisy is borrowing PHP 29,000 through NWTF to purchase spare parts and other computer materials for her internet café business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Daisy has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and other computer materials.

loans.name: Sulma Yaneth

texts.es:
Sulma, de 29 años de edad, es ama de casa, estudió hasta octavo grado, no continuó estudiando debido a que sus padres eran de bajos recursos económicos y también porque la escuela le quedaba muy lejos de la casa, está acompañada, tiene 3 hijas que aún están pequeños y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura y ella también le ayuda en este trabajo.

Sulma, se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería desde que vivía junto a sus padres, es por ello que conoce muy bien este trabajo, su pareja también se ha dedicado a este trabajo desde hace varios años; especificamente siembran maíz y el terreno donde tiene la cosecha está a un kilómetro de su hogar, con ello buscan generar ingresos para satisfacer las necesidades de su hogar y darle lo necesario a sus pequeños hijos.

Sulma, necesita el préstamo para comprar dos novillos de repasto para engordarlos y cuando estén grandes venderlos a buen precio y de la ganancia espera cubrir algunas necesidades de sus hijos.

El sueño de Sulma, es tener una casa propia y darle estudio a sus hijos para que tengan mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sulma is 29 years old. She is a housewife and studied until the 8th grade. She did not continue studying because her parents had very little economic resources and also because the school was located very far from their home. She is married and has 3 daughters who are still small and her partner works in agriculture. She helps him with this work as well.

Sulma has worked in agriculture and livestock since she lived with her parents. It is because of this that she knows this work very well. Her husband has also worked in this field for various years. Specifically, they plant corn and the land where they have the crop is one kilometer from their house. With this crop they look to generate income to meet the needs of their home and to provide what is needed for their small children.

Sulma needs the loan to purchase two pasture steers to fatten them, and when they are big, to sell them for a good price. She hopes to cover some of the expenses of her children with the earnings. Sulma's dream is to have her own home and to provide schooling for her children so they can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase two pasture steers to fatten them.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina works hard to support her family. Josefina is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her tailoring business like linen, a yard stick, measurement tape, etc.

Josefina has been in this business for 8 years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her tailoring business like linen, a yard stick and measurement tape.

loans.name: Notre

texts.en:
Notre, 45, is a married woman with seven children, three of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Notre has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years.

Notre requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more boxes of fish to sell to her local market.

She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of fish to sell to her local market.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Jacqueline works hard to support her family.

She makes dried fish in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a general store.

Jacqueline is borrowing PHP 40,000 through NWTF to purchase more fish to dry for her dried fish business.

Jacqueline has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to make dried fish.

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es: La Sra. Erika tiene 38 años de edad, esta soltera con 2 hijos dependientes. Es la presidenta del grupo “El Progreso” formada hace más de 5 años y que ahora la integran 6 mujeres muy responsables y dedicadas en cumplir sus objetivos. Erika tiene como negocio hace algunos años un pequeño taller donde hace todo tipo de calzado especialmente zapatillas deportivas, que gracias a ello obtiene ingresos para cubrir con los gastos de alimentación, servicios del hogar y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus dos hijos. El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar los materiales como pegamentos, cuerinas que necesita para realizar las zapatillas. Su plan a futuro es hacer crecer su taller y poder comprar puestos de venta para ofrecer sus productos al público. En la foto grupal Erika se encuentra de pie en medio de las demás señoras sentadas.
texts.en:
Erika is 38 years old. She is single with 2 dependent children. She is the president of the group "El Progreso" formed more than 5 years ago and which now has 6 very responsible women who are dedicated to meeting their goals.

For several years, Erika has had a business in a small shop where she makes all types of shoes, especially sporty sneakers. Thanks to this, she gets an income to cover food expenses, household services and to give her two children a better quality of life.

She will use the loan to buy the materials such as the glue and leather pieces that she needs to make the sneakers. Her future plan is to make her shop grow and be able to buy stalls to offer her products to the public.

In the group photo, Erika is standing amongst the other sitting women.

loans.use: to buy materials to make sneakers.

loans.name: Eneyda Del Socorro

texts.es: Eneyda es una mujer trabajadora de 47 años de edad, casada y madre de un hijo de ocho años, por quien trabaja fuertemente para darle una mejor educación y encaminarlo por el buen camino, ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y ropa de segunda mano, una de sus metas es expandir su negocio y surtirlo por medio de la oferta de nuevos productos que le han demandado sus clientes, por tanto solicita por primera vez el financiamiento de la institución para la compra de perfumes, cremas, maquillajes, blusas y pantalones.
texts.en: Eneyda is a hardworking woman who is 47 years old, married and the mother of an 8 year-old boy for whom she works hard to provide him with a better education and to put him on a good path. She works selling cosmetics and second-hand clothing. One of her goals is to expand her business and supply it by offering new products that her clients have demanded. Because of this she is seeking financing from the institution for the first time to purchase perfumes, creams, makeup, blouses and pants.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, creams, makeup, blouses and pants.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda is 61 years old, married, and has five children.

Luzviminda works hard to provide for her family.

She runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from food vending.

Luzviminda requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of household goods to sell.

Luzviminda has borrowed and paid five loans from NWTF before this loan.

Luzviminda aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of household goods to sell.

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda works hard to support her family. Luzviminda is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for eight years now.

She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional fish nets and materials for boat repair.

In the future, Luzviminda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish nets and materials for boat repair.
